main event: An unidentified observer reported seeing a round, gray object with a glow moving slowly at a low altitude near Middletown, Ohio.
interesting points: The object was described as neither a star, meteor, nor aircraft.,The sighting occurred on November 6, 1957, at 8:00 PM.,The observer's identity remains unknown.,The object was observed to be glowing in the middle.,The sighting has multiple conclusions suggesting it might be a balloon or aircraft, but insufficient data to determine the exact nature.
sighted object: a round, gray object with a glow
witness description: Mr. Shumar and his wife observed the object.
